languages.text: {n}Минута безмолвия, кажется, тянется вечность. Наконец Висирь отвечает — с горечью всепрощающего отца.{/n} "Это... тоже один из путей, дочь. Я понимаю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Минута безмолвия, кажется, тянется вечность. Наконец Висирь отвечает — с горечью всепрощающего отца.{/n} "Это... тоже один из путей, дочь. Я понимаю".

languages.text: {n}Silence falls for what feels like an eternity. At last, the Vizsier responds with the sadness of an all-forgiving father,{/n} "That... is one of the threads as well, my daughter. I understand you."
languages.original_text: {n}Минута безмолвия, кажется, тянется вечность. Наконец Висирь отвечает — с горечью всепрощающего отца.{/n} "Это... тоже один из путей, дочь. Я понимаю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Silence falls for what feels like an eternity. At last, the Vizsier responds with the sadness of an all-forgiving father,{/n} "That... is one of the threads as well, my daughter. I understand you."
{n}The Vizsier frowns sorrowfully.{/n} "That... is a way too, my daughter. I can understand."

{n}Silence falls for what feels like an eternity. At last, the Vizsier responds with the sadness of an all-forgiving father,{/n} "That... is one of the threads as well, my daughter. I understand you."
{n}The Vizsier face grows mournful.{/n} "That... is one of the threads as well, my daughter. I understand you."

{n}Silence falls for what feels like an eternity. At last, the Vizsier responds with the sadness of an all-forgiving father,{/n} "That... is one of the threads as well, my daughter. I understand you."

{n}Silence falls for what feels like an eternity. At last, the Vizsier responds with the sadness of an all-forgiving father,{/n} "That... is one of the threads as well, my daughter. I understand you."

languages.text: {n}S'installe alors un silence qui semble durer une éternité. Puis, le vizir répond avec la tristesse d'un père prêt à pardonner toutes les offenses :{/n} « Il s'agit là aussi... de l'un des fils possibles, ma fille. Je comprends. »
languages.original_text: {n}Silence falls for what feels like an eternity. At last, the Vizsier responds with the sadness of an all-forgiving father,{/n} "That... is one of the threads as well, my daughter. I understand you."

traits.locale_text: {n}S'installe alors un silence qui semble durer une éternité. Puis, le vizir répond avec la tristesse d'un père prêt à pardonner toutes les offenses :{/n} « Il s'agit là aussi... de l'un des fils possibles, ma fille. Je comprends. »

languages.text: {n}Se hace el silencio durante lo que parece una eternidad. El Visir responde con la tristeza de un padre que todo lo perdona:{/n} «Eso... también forma parte de los hilos, hija mía. Lo comprendo».
languages.original_text: {n}Silence falls for what feels like an eternity. At last, the Vizsier responds with the sadness of an all-forgiving father,{/n} "That... is one of the threads as well, my daughter. I understand you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se hace el silencio durante lo que parece una eternidad. El Visir responde con la tristeza de un padre que todo lo perdona:{/n} «Eso... también forma parte de los hilos, hija mía. Lo comprendo».

languages.text: {n}永遠のような沈黙が流れる。やっとヴィジールは、すべてを許す父親の如く悲し気に話し出した。{/n}「それもまた…糸のひとつだ、娘よ。お前の気持ちは分かる」
languages.original_text: {n}Silence falls for what feels like an eternity. At last, the Vizsier responds with the sadness of an all-forgiving father,{/n} "That... is one of the threads as well, my daughter. I understand you."

traits.locale_text: {n}永遠のような沈黙が流れる。やっとヴィジールは、すべてを許す父親の如く悲し気に話し出した。{/n}「それもまた…糸のひとつだ、娘よ。お前の気持ちは分かる」

languages.text: {n}沉默笼罩在了两人之间，仿佛永远无法休止。到最后，宿老以悲伤的语气开了口，仿佛愿意宽恕女儿一切过失的父亲一般。{/n}“这……也是其中一条丝线，我的女儿。我理解你的选择。”
languages.original_text: {n}Silence falls for what feels like an eternity. At last, the Vizsier responds with the sadness of an all-forgiving father,{/n} "That... is one of the threads as well, my daughter. I understand you."

traits.locale_text: {n}沉默笼罩在了两人之间，仿佛永远无法休止。到最后，宿老以悲伤的语气开了口，仿佛愿意宽恕女儿一切过失的父亲一般。{/n}“这……也是其中一条丝线，我的女儿。我理解你的选择。”

languages.text: {n}Es entsteht eine Stille, die eine gefühlte Ewigkeit lang anhält. Endlich antwortet der Wesir mit der Traurigkeit eines alles vergebenden Vaters.{/n} "Das ... ist auch einer der Fäden, meine Tochter. Ich verstehe Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}Silence falls for what feels like an eternity. At last, the Vizsier responds with the sadness of an all-forgiving father,{/n} "That... is one of the threads as well, my daughter. I understand you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Es entsteht eine Stille, die eine gefühlte Ewigkeit lang anhält. Endlich antwortet der Wesir mit der Traurigkeit eines alles vergebenden Vaters.{/n} "Das ... ist auch einer der Fäden, meine Tochter. Ich verstehe Euch."

languages.text: {n}Ebediyet gibi gelen bir süre boyunca ortama sükûnet çöküyor. En nihayetinde Vezir, her şeyi affeden bir babanın hüznüyle yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Bu da... İpliklerden bir tanesiydi kızım. Seni anlıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Silence falls for what feels like an eternity. At last, the Vizsier responds with the sadness of an all-forgiving father,{/n} "That... is one of the threads as well, my daughter. I understand you."
